item.title: Privacy Policy for My Instagram Profile | Datenschutzerklärung für mein Instagram-Profil
item.description: EN: This Privacy Policy is available in both English and German. The English version appears first, followed by the German version below. You can use the links below to navigate directly to your preferred language. DE: Diese Datenschutzerklärung ist in englischer und deutscher Sprache verfügbar. Die englische Version erscheint zuerst, die deutsche Version weiter unten. Sie können die Links unten verwenden, um direkt zu Ihrer bevorzugten Sprache zu gelangen. item.title: Legal Notice
item.description: A note on Transparency Hello, dear reader. 🌸 I’m Kaia Meier, the creative mind behind this sewing journal, and I’d like to share a little something with you. Since the beginning of “Dressed in a Dress”, I’ve been using “K. Meier” as a pseudonym to protect the privacy of my loved ones and myself. However, because I live in Germany, I must include formal details—like my real name—to comply with transparency laws.
